name: Pocket Lights
description:
The classic light-toggling game, now available for your Playdate! You may have played a similar game to this on a handheld Lights Out electronic game or another app. The goal of the game is to turn out all the lights, but each time you toggle a light, its neighbors get toggled too! 

Game features include:

  • over 50 hand curated puzzles for you to solve!
  • a new daily puzzle every day!
  • Play any previous day's Daily puzzle, starting from 12/31/2022
  • dark mode!

I'm planning on adding additional puzzles, game modes, and more in the future. I'd love to hear any feedback, be it feature requests, bug reports, or just your thoughts on the game.

If you'd like to check out my other Playdate works you can scratch your Wordle itch with Worddate, or get yourself a handy stopwatch/timer PlayTimer.
